title: Consider the role of siblings
text: Think about the long-term relationship between siblings and how it might differ from that of parents.

title: Lifelong involvement
text: Siblings often remain involved in each other's lives longer than parents do. How might this affect the need for training and support?

hintAnswer: yes, because they will usually be involved in one another's lives longer than the parents
title: Understanding family dynamics
text: Why might siblings need training and support in addition to parents?
choices: yes, because they will usually be involved in one another's lives longer than the parents
yes, because they may have a child with ASD
no, because they do not take on parenting roles
no, because they do not need to be involved
